backend/main.mo: Defines the backend actor with product, order, customer, session, and store settings types plus state maps and authorization/storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries documenting admin UI routing fixes and diagnostic safeguards with affected files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten one‑sentence summaries for many frontend files, focusing on admin, product, and layout functionality.
frontend/.redeploy-trigger: Marker file used to force a rebuild and deployment without code changes.
frontend/docs/custom-domain.md: Documentation explaining how to configure DNS and register a custom domain for the deployed frontend canister.
frontend/docs/rebuild-redeploy.md: Guide describing how to trigger a fresh rebuild and redeployment of the application.
frontend/index.css: Global stylesheet defining theme variables, typography, animations, and Tailwind layers.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entrypoint loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up React Router and Query Client, defines public and admin routes, and wraps the app with theme and query providers.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminAcces: Deprecated wrapper component that simply renders children and no longer performs auth checks.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminRoute: Route guard that validates the admin session and redirects unauthenticated users using safeNavigate.
frontend/src/components/admin/dashboard/: Layout wrapper providing sidebar navigation, mobile menu, and logout handling for admin dashboard sections.
Displays a table of customers with name, contact details, order count, and total spent, with loading skeletons.
Shows store overview stats, low‑stock alerts, and recent data using dashboard metrics with navigation support.
Manages order list display, viewing details, and updating order statuses with dialogs and loading states.
Handles product listing, creation, editing, and deletion with form dialogs, image validation, and CRUD actions.
Provides a form to update store contact info and branding images with validation and update handling.
frontend/src/components/admin/OwnerOnlyR: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/auth/CustomerLog: Customer login modal handling email-based login, address management, and order display.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Button toggling Internet Identity login/logout with loading states.
frontend/src/components/brand/BrandPrimi: Shared UI primitives for sections, containers, cards, badges, and buttons with brand styling.
frontend/src/components/brand/GlobalNeon: Disabled component returning null for unused neon background.
frontend/src/components/brand/NeonSurfac: Wrapper that simply returns children without neon effects.
frontend/src/components/cart/CartSheet.t: Slide-in cart panel showing items, quantities, pricing, and checkout trigger.
frontend/src/components/common/DrawerClo: Small reusable close button for drawers using an icon.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer with brand info, social links, newsletter form, and dynamic settings.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Site header with logo, navigation, account access, and cart interactions.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Layout wrapper that includes the header unless on admin routes.
frontend/src/components/news/NewsCard.ts: Card displaying a product update with type badge, date, and preview text.
frontend/src/components/orders/DeliveryA: Form component for entering and validating delivery address fields before submitting to a parent callback.
frontend/src/components/orders/PlaceOrde: Modal workflow for selecting or adding an address and placing an order, handling authentication and cart submission.
frontend/src/components/products/PriceDi: Displays formatted product pricing with discount and size options using utility formatting.
frontend/src/components/products/Product: Product preview card showing image, price, availability badge, and navigation to product details.
frontend/src/components/products/Purchas: Disabled purchase UI placeholder indicating checkout is not yet available.
frontend/src/components/products/Variant: Selector UI for weight or flavor variants that triggers price and variant updates.
frontend/src/config/owner.ts: Defines and checks the owner principal used for admin access control.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook for creating and caching the backend actor tied to the user's identity with automatic query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminCustomers.ts: Builds a customer list with aggregated order counts and totals from admin order data.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminDashboardData: Aggregates admin dashboard metrics including product counts, low stock items, recent orders, and customer totals.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminOrders.ts: Manages fetching and updating admin orders with live updates and status mutation handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminProducts.ts: Provides admin product CRUD mutations with image upload handling and query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminSession.ts: Manages admin session state with localStorage, simulated login, and session validation.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminStoreSettings: Fetches and updates store settings, handles image uploads, and syncs parsed contact/social data.
frontend/src/hooks/useCart.ts: Manages shopping cart state with localStorage persistence, item operations, and totals.
Loads, saves, and deletes customer delivery addresses tied to the active session.
frontend/src/hooks/useCustomerOrders.ts: Fetches customer orders with session-based querying and optional live updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useCustomerSession.ts: Handles customer login, logout, and session persistence with simulated authentication.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, login flow, identity loading, and state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsAdminRoute.ts: Detects if the current pathname begins with /admin.
frontend/src/hooks/useLiveUpdateConfig.t: Returns default refetch settings for live-updating queries.
frontend/src/hooks/usePageMeta.ts: Updates document title and meta description based on provided values.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating products, updates, and user profiles via the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useStoreSettings.ts: Fetches store settings with caching and exposes loading and error states.
frontend/src/index.css: Imports global stylesheet from parent directory.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin dashboard root that switches between dashboard sections inside an admin shell.
Admin login form handling authentication, redirects, and validation states.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSiteSettin: Empty placeholder admin site settings page.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with hero section, trust highlights, and navigation to products.
frontend/src/pages/NewsDetailPage.tsx: Displays details for a single news update, including product info and metadata.
frontend/src/pages/NewsPage.tsx: Lists news updates with filtering by type and auto-refresh indicators.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPolicyPage.tsx: Static privacy policy page with structured sections and metadata.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: Product detail page that loads a product, manages variant/quantity selection, and allows adding items to the cart.
frontend/src/pages/ProductsPage.tsx: Lists products with category tabs, loading states, and last-updated info using product query hooks.
frontend/src/pages/TermsPage.tsx: Static terms and conditions page with structured sections and page metadata.
frontend/src/utils/assets.ts: Encodes filenames in asset URLs to avoid issues with spaces and special characters.
frontend/src/utils/externalBlob.ts: Provides helpers to convert files to bytes and simulate external blob uploads with progress.
frontend/src/utils/jpeg.ts: Validates JPEG files and reads them as bytes via FileReader.
frontend/src/utils/price.ts: Helpers for INR price formatting, discount detection, and price display data.
frontend/src/utils/principal.ts: Validates and formats Dfinity principals, including parsing and display truncation.
frontend/src/utils/safeNavigate.ts: Provides a debounced navigation helper that avoids repeated or rapid navigations to the same path and logs warnings when blocked.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions to read URL params, persist them in sessionStorage, and clean them from hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, fonts, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, known issues, and feature requirements related to admin dashboard flicker fixes.
